title: Code.org CS Ambassador Program - Event Survey

elements.name: intro_text
elements.html:
Thank you for hosting a CS Ambassador Event!

In order to measure the impact of our program, we need to gather some information about your event. This step is required for your event to be counted towards the Ambassador Program.

elements.name: teacher_account
elements.title: Are you logged in to your teacher account?
elements.description: If you are logged into your teacher account you will see an option to create a section on your dashboard.

choices.text: Yes, I am logged into my teacher account
No, I am logged into my student account

elements.name: student_account
elements.html:
Please sign out and sign back in using your teacher account credentials

Remember that you should sign in using your Code.org teacher account for all activities you do as an ambassador. This is the account that has +amb in the email address.

elements.name: event_info_header
elements.html:
Event Information

Please answer these questions about your event.

elements.name: event_date
elements.title: What is the date of your event?

elements.name: event_type
elements.title: Is this an "Experience CS" event or a "Connect with CS" event?

choices.text: Connect with CS (not in Code Studio)

elements.name: total_participants
elements.title: How many students attended your event? If you were not able to get an exact count, provide your best estimate.

elements.name: collection_cat
elements.title: Did you collect information from event participants about their interest in enrolling in a computer science class at your school next year, at the start and end of your event?

choices.text: I collected this information at the start of my event
I collected this information at the end of my event
I did not collect this information

elements.name: num_pre_enrollment
elements.title: At the *start* of your event, how many students indicated interest in enrolling in a computer science class at your school next year?

elements.name: num_post_enrollment
elements.title: At the *end* of your event, how many students indicated interest in enrolling in a computer science class at your school next year?

elements.name: cdo_heart_you
